136 void iList::dconnect(iListElement* p)
137 {
138  iListElement* pPtr,*nPtr;
139 
140  Size --;
141 
142  if(Size > 0){
143  pPtr = p -> prev;
144  nPtr = p -> next;
145 
146  if(pPtr) pPtr -> next = nPtr;
147  nPtr -> prev = pPtr;
148 
149  if(p == first) first = nPtr;
150  if(p == last) last = pPtr;
151 
152  last -> next = first;
153  first -> prev = NULL;
154  }
155  else
156  init_list();
157 }
158 
159 void iList::swap(iListElement* p,iListElement* p1)
160 {
161  if(p1 != p -> prev)
162  ErrH.Abort("actInt swap error...");
163 
164  if(p1 == first){
165  first = p;
166  }
167  if(p == last)
168  last = p1;
169 
170  p -> prev = p1 -> prev;
171  p1 -> prev = p;
172 
173  p1 -> next = p -> next;
174  p -> next = p1;
175 
176  if(p1 -> next -> prev) p1 -> next -> prev = p1;
177  if(p -> prev)
178  p -> prev -> next = p;
179  else
180  last -> next = p;
181 }

236 iScreen::~iScreen(void)
237 {

239  iScreenObject* obj,*obj1;
240  iScreenEvent* ev,*ev1;
241  obj = (iScreenObject*)objList -> last;
242  while(obj){
243  obj1 = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
244  delete obj;
245  obj = obj1;
246  }
247  obj = (iScreenObject*)TerrainList -> last;
248  while(obj){
249  obj1 = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
250  delete obj;
251  obj = obj1;
252  }

254  while(ev){
255  ev1 = (iScreenEvent*)ev -> prev;

390 void iScreenObject::copy(iScreenObject* dest)
391 {
392  int i;
393  iTriggerObject* p;
394  iScreenEvent* dest_ev,*ev;
395  iScreenElement* dest_el,*el;
396 
397  dest -> PosX = PosX;
398  dest -> PosY = PosY;
399 
400  dest -> SizeX = SizeX;
401  dest -> SizeY = SizeY;
402 
403  dest -> align_x = align_x;
404  dest -> align_y = align_y;
405  dest -> align_x_offs = align_x_offs;
406  dest -> align_y_offs = align_y_offs;
407 
408  dest -> flags = flags;
409 
410  dest -> curHeightScale = curHeightScale;
411  dest -> HeightScaleDelta = HeightScaleDelta;
412 
413  dest -> SmoothLevel = SmoothLevel;
414  dest -> SmoothDelta = SmoothDelta;
415  dest -> SmoothTime = SmoothTime;
416  dest -> SmoothCount = SmoothCount;
417 
418  ev = (iScreenEvent*)EventList -> last;
419  while(ev){
420  dest_ev = new iScreenEvent;
421  ev -> copy(dest_ev);
422  dest -> EventList -> connect((iListElement*)dest_ev);
423  ev = (iScreenEvent*)ev -> prev;
424  }
425 
426  if(flags & OBJ_TRIGGER){
427  p = (iTriggerObject*)this;
428 
429  ((iTriggerObject*)dest) -> state = p -> state;
430  ((iTriggerObject*)dest) -> num_state = p -> num_state;
431 
432  ((iTriggerObject*)dest) -> alloc_state();
433  for(i = 0; i < p -> num_state; i ++){
434  dest_el = iCreateScreenElement(((iScreenElement*)p -> StateElem[i]) -> type,((iScreenElement*)p->StateElem[i])->ID_ptr.c_str(),(iScreenElement*)p -> StateElem[i]);
435  ((iTriggerObject*)dest) -> StateElem[i] = dest_el;
436  dest -> add_element((iListElement*)dest_el);
437  }
438  } else {
439  el = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
440  while(el){
441  dest_el = iCreateScreenElement(el -> type,el->ID_ptr.c_str(),NULL);
442  el -> copy(dest_el);
443  dest -> add_element((iListElement*)dest_el);
444  el = (iScreenElement*)el -> prev;
445  }
446  }
447 }

449 void iScreenElement::copy(iScreenElement* dest)
450 {
451  int i,sz;
452  iListElement* p,*pd;
453  iList* l,*ld;
454 
455  dest -> type = type;
456 
457  dest -> lX = lX;
458  dest -> lY = lY;
459 
460  dest -> SizeX = SizeX;
461  dest -> SizeY = SizeY;
462 
463  dest -> scale = scale;
464  dest -> scale_delta = scale_delta;
465 
466  dest -> align_x = align_x;
467  dest -> align_y = align_y;
468  dest -> align_x_offs = align_x_offs;
469  dest -> align_y_offs = align_y_offs;
470 
471  dest -> flags = flags;
472 
473  dest -> null_level = null_level;
474 
475  switch(type){
476  case I_STRING_ELEM:
477  ((iStringElement*)dest) -> font = ((iStringElement*)this) -> font;
478  ((iStringElement*)dest) -> space = ((iStringElement*)this) -> space;
479  sz = strlen(((iStringElement*)this) -> string);
480  strcpy(((iStringElement*)dest) -> string,((iStringElement*)this) -> string);
481  break;
482  case I_BITMAP_ELEM:
483  case I_SCROLLER_ELEM:
484  ((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> bSizeX = ((iBitmapElement*)this) -> bSizeX;
485  ((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> bSizeY = ((iBitmapElement*)this) -> bSizeY;
486 
487  ((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> bmp_null_level = ((iBitmapElement*)this) -> bmp_null_level;
488 
489  sz = strlen(((iBitmapElement*)this) -> fname);
490  ((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> fname = new char[sz + 1];
491  strcpy(((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> fname,((iBitmapElement*)this) -> fname);
492 
493  l = ((iBitmapElement*)this) -> bmp_names;
494  ld = ((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> bmp_names;
495  p = l -> first;
496  for(i = 0; i < l -> Size; i ++){
497  pd = new iListElement;
498  pd -> init_id(p->ID_ptr.c_str());
499  ld -> connect(pd);
500  p = p -> next;
501  }
502 
503  l = ((iBitmapElement*)this) -> pal_names;
504  ld = ((iBitmapElement*)dest) -> pal_names;
505  p = l -> first;
506  for(i = 0; i < l -> Size; i ++){
507  pd = new iListElement;
508  pd->init_id(p->ID_ptr.c_str());
509  ld -> connect(pd);
510  p = p -> next;
511  }
512 
513  if(type == I_SCROLLER_ELEM){
514  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> dir = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> dir;
515  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> Value = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> Value;
516  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> maxValue = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> maxValue;
517  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> prevValue = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> prevValue;
518  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> scale = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> scale;
519  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> scale_delta = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> scale_delta;
520  ((iScrollerElement*)dest) -> space = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> space;
521  }
522  break;
523  case I_TERRAIN_ELEM:
524  ((iTerrainElement*)dest) -> scale_strength = ((iTerrainElement*)this) -> scale_strength;
525  ((iTerrainElement*)dest) -> def_null_level = ((iTerrainElement*)this) -> def_null_level;
526  ((iTerrainElement*)dest) -> level_delta = ((iTerrainElement*)this) -> level_delta;
527 
528  ((iTerrainElement*)dest) -> pX = ((iTerrainElement*)this) -> pX;
529  ((iTerrainElement*)dest) -> pY = ((iTerrainElement*)this) -> pY;
530  break;
531  case I_S_STRING_ELEM:
532  ((iS_StringElement*)dest) -> font = ((iS_StringElement*)this) -> font;
533  ((iS_StringElement*)dest) -> space = ((iS_StringElement*)this) -> space;
534 // sz = strlen(((iS_StringElement*)this) -> string);
535 // ((iS_StringElement*)dest) -> string = new char[sz + 1];
536  strcpy(((iS_StringElement*)dest) -> string,((iS_StringElement*)this) -> string);
537  break;
538  case I_AVI_ELEM:
539  ((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_type = ((iAVIElement*)this) -> border_type;
540  ((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_level = ((iAVIElement*)this) -> border_level;
541  ((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_null_level = ((iAVIElement*)this) -> border_null_level;
542  ((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_size = ((iAVIElement*)this) -> border_size;
543 
544  if(((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_type == AVI_SHAPED_BORDER){
545  sz = strlen(((iAVIElement*)this) -> border_shape_file);
546  ((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_shape_file = new char[sz + 1];
547  strcpy(((iAVIElement*)dest) -> border_shape_file,((iAVIElement*)this) -> border_shape_file);
548  }
549 
550  l = ((iAVIElement*)this) -> avi_ids;
551  ld = ((iAVIElement*)dest) -> avi_ids;
552  p = l -> first;
553  for(i = 0; i < l -> Size; i ++){
554  pd = new iListElement;
555  pd -> init_id(p->ID_ptr.c_str());
556  ld -> connect(pd);
557  p = p -> next;
558  }
559 
560  strcpy(((iAVIElement*)dest) -> avi_name,((iAVIElement*)this) -> avi_name);
561  break;
562  case I_AVI_BORDER_ELEM:
563  ((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_type = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_type;
564  ((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_level = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_level;
565  ((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_null_level = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_null_level;
566  ((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_size = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_size;
567  ((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> dir = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> dir;
568 
569  if(((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_type == AVI_SHAPED_BORDER){
570  sz = strlen(((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_shape_file);
571  ((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_shape_file = new char[sz + 1];
572  strcpy(((iAVIBorderElement*)dest) -> border_shape_file,((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_shape_file);
573  }
574  break;
575  }
576 }

823 void iTriggerObject::change_state(int time,int st)
824 {
825  iScreenElement* p;
826 
827  p = (iScreenElement*)StateElem[state];
828  p -> scale_delta = -p -> scale / time;
829  p -> flags |= EL_HIDE;
830 
831  prev_state = state;
832 
833  if(st == -1){
834  state ++;
835  }
836  else {
837  if(st == -2)
838  state --;
839  else
840  state = st;
841  }
842 
843  if(state >= num_state)
844  state = 0;
845  if(state < 0)
846  state = num_state - 1;
847 
848  p = (iScreenElement*)StateElem[state];
849  p -> flags &= ~EL_NO_REDRAW;
850  p -> scale = 0;
851  p -> scale_delta = (256 - p -> scale) / time;
852  p -> flags |= EL_HIDE;
853 
854  if (callback) {
855  callback(state);
856  }
857 }
858 
859 iTriggerObject::iTriggerObject(void)
860 {
861  num_state = 2;
862  state = 0;
863  StateElem = NULL;
864  callback = NULL;
865 }

885 void iScrollerElement::change_quant(void)

893 void iScrollerElement::change_val(int x,int y)
894 {
895  x -= lX + ((iScreenObject*)owner) -> PosX;
896  y -= lY + ((iScreenObject*)owner) -> PosY;
897 
898  prevValue = Value;
899  switch(dir){
900  case I_LEFT:
901  Value = (SizeX - x - bSizeX - space) / (bSizeX + space);
902  break;
903  case I_UP:
904  Value = (SizeY - y - bSizeY - space) / (bSizeY + space);
905  break;
906  case I_RIGHT:
907  Value = x / (bSizeX + space);
908  break;
909  case I_DOWN:
910  Value = y / (bSizeY + space);
911  break;
912  }
913  if(Value < 0) Value = 0;
914  if(Value > maxValue) Value = maxValue;
915  scale = (Value > prevValue) ? -256 : 256;
916 }

1203 void iBitmapElement::load(void)
1204 {
1205  int i,t,sz;
1206  XStream fh;
1207  if(!(flags & EL_DATA_LOADED)){
1208  if(flags & EL_NONE_BMP){
1209  sz = bSizeX * bSizeY;
1210  fdata = new char[sz];
1211  memset(fdata,0,sz);
1212  }
1213  else {
1214  fh.open(fname,XS_IN);
1215  fh > bSizeX > bSizeY;
1216 
1217  sz = bSizeX * bSizeY;
1218  fdata = new char[sz];
1219  fh.read(fdata,sz);
1220  fh.close();
1221 
1222  if(!(flags & EL_PICTURE)){
1223  for(i = 0; i < sz; i ++){
1224  t = ((unsigned char*)fdata)[i];
1225  if(t)
1226  t += bmp_null_level;
1227  else
1228  t = HFONT_NULL_LEVEL;
1229 
1230  fdata[i] = t;
1231  }
1232  }
1233  else {
1234  if(flags & EL_HIDDEN_FON)
1235  memset(fdata,0,sz);
1236  }
1237  set_pal();
1238  }
1239  }
1240  flags |= EL_DATA_LOADED;
1241 }

1327 #define iS_STR_COL_START 144
1328 #define iS_STR_COL_SIZE 1
1329 
1330 #define iS_STR_COL0_START 0
1331 #define iS_STR_COL0_SIZE 1
1332 
1333 #define S_STRING_DELTA 3
1334 void iScreenElement::redraw(int x,int y,int sc,int sm,int hide_mode)
1335 {
1336  int i,v = 0,maxv = 0,bsx = 0,bsy = 0,bs = 0,sp = 0,pv = 0,offs,lev = 0,col = iS_STR_COL_START,col_sz = iS_STR_COL_SIZE,dx1,dx2,dy1,dy2;
1337  int null_lev = null_level;
1338  unsigned char* p,*p1,*data = NULL;
1339 
1340  if(flags & EL_NO_SCALE && scale != 256)
1341  return;
1342 
1343 // if(flags & EL_NO_SCALE)
1344 // sc = 256;
1345 
1346  if(flags & EL_HIDE)
1347  hide_mode = 1;
1348 
1349  if(flags & EL_SCALE_NULL){
1350  null_lev = (null_level * sc) >> 8;
1351  }
1352 //std::cout<<"iScreenElement::redraw"<<std::endl;
1353  switch(type){
1354  case I_AVI_ELEM:
1355  //std::cout<<"I_AVI_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1356  if(flags & AVI_STOPPED) return;
1357  break;
1358  case I_AVI_BORDER_ELEM:
1359  //std::cout<<"I_AVI_BORDER_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1360  bsx = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> ShapeX;
1361  bsy = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> ShapeY;
1362  bs = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_size;
1363  lev = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_null_level;
1364  col = ((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_level;
1365 
1366  lev = (lev * sc) >> 8;
1367  col = (col * sc) >> 8;
1368  break;
1369  case I_STRING_ELEM:
1370  //std::cout<<"I_STRING_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1371  data = (unsigned char*)(((iStringElement*)this) -> string);
1372  break;
1373  case I_S_STRING_ELEM:
1374  //std::cout<<"I_S_STRING_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1375  data = (unsigned char*)(((iS_StringElement*)this) -> string);
1376  if(((iScreenObject*)owner) -> flags & OBJ_SELECTABLE && !(((iScreenObject*)owner) -> flags & OBJ_SELECTED)){
1377  col = iS_STR_COL0_START;
1378  col_sz = iS_STR_COL0_SIZE;
1379  }
1380  break;
1381  case I_BITMAP_ELEM:
1382  //std::cout<<"I_BITMAP_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1383  data = (unsigned char*)(((iBitmapElement*)this) -> fdata);
1384  break;
1385  case I_SCROLLER_ELEM:
1386  //std::cout<<"I_SCROLLER_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1387  data = (unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata);
1388  v = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> Value;
1389  pv = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> prevValue;
1390 
1391  if(pv > v){
1392  pv = v;
1393  v = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> prevValue;
1394  }
1395  maxv = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> maxValue;
1396  bsx = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> bSizeX;
1397  bsy = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> bSizeY;
1398  sp = ((iScrollerElement*)this) -> space;
1399  break;
1400  case I_TERRAIN_ELEM:
1401  //std::cout<<"I_TERRAIN_ELEM"<<std::endl;
1402  data = ((iScreenObject*)owner) -> fonData;
1403  bsx = ((iScreenObject*)owner) -> SizeX;
1404  bsy = ((iScreenObject*)owner) -> SizeY;
1405  break;
1406  }
1407 
1408  if(scale != 256)
1409  sc = (sc * scale) >> 8;
1410 
1411  if(!sm){
1412  //std::cout<<"sm = 0"<<std::endl;
1413  switch(type){
1414  case I_STRING_ELEM:
1415  if(terrainNum == -1)
1416  iPutStr(x + lX,y + lY,((iStringElement*)this) -> font,data,0,sc,((iStringElement*)this) -> space,null_lev,hide_mode);
1417  else
1418  i_terrPutStr(x + lX,y + lY,((iStringElement*)this) -> font,data,0,sc,((iStringElement*)this) -> space,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1419  break;
1420  case I_S_STRING_ELEM:
1421  dx1 = (x + lX < S_STRING_DELTA) ? (x + lX) : S_STRING_DELTA;
1422  dx2 = (x + lX + SizeX < I_MAP_RES_X - 1 - S_STRING_DELTA) ? S_STRING_DELTA : ((I_MAP_RES_X - 1) - (x + lX + SizeX));
1423  dy1 = (y + lY < S_STRING_DELTA) ? (y + lY) : S_STRING_DELTA;
1424  dy2 = (y + lY + SizeY < I_RES_Y - 1 - S_STRING_DELTA) ? S_STRING_DELTA : ((I_RES_Y - 1) - (y + lY + SizeY));
1425  bsx = SizeX + dx1 + dx2;
1426  bsy = SizeY + dy1 + dy2;
1427  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1428 
1429  memset(p,0,bsx * bsy);
1430  lev = (null_lev * abs(sc)) >> 8;
1431 
1432 // iPutS_Str(dx1,dy1,((iS_StringElement*)this) -> font,col,data,bsx,bsy,p,((iStringElement*)this) -> space);
1433 // s_smooth_buf(bsx,bsy,p,0,iS_STR_SEG_START_COL);
1434 
1435  aPutStr32(dx1,dy1,((iS_StringElement*)this) -> font,col,col_sz,data,bsx,p,((iStringElement*)this) -> space);
1436  put_buf2col(x + lX - dx1,y + lY - dy1,bsx,bsy,p,lev);
1437 
1438  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1439  break;
1440  case I_BITMAP_ELEM:
1441  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1442  if(!(flags & EL_PICTURE)){
1443  scale_buf(SizeX,SizeY,sc,(unsigned char*)(((iBitmapElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1444  if(terrainNum == -1)
1445  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1446  else
1447  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1448  }
1449  else {
1450  lev = (null_lev * abs(sc)) >> 8;
1451  if(lev){
1452  if(flags & EL_HIDDEN_FON)
1453  put_buf2col(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,data,lev,0);
1454  else
1455  put_buf2col(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,data,lev,1);
1456  if(((iBitmapElement*)this) -> ibs)
1457  ((iBitmapElement*)this) -> ibs -> show();
1458  }
1459  else
1460  put_map(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY);
1461  }
1462  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1463  break;
1464  case I_SCROLLER_ELEM:
1465  if(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> dir == I_RIGHT){
1466  offs = sp + bsx;
1467  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1468  for(i = 0; i < pv; i ++){
1469  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1470  if(terrainNum == -1)
1471  put_buf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1472  else
1473  put_tbuf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1474  offs += sp + bsx;
1475  }
1476  for(i = pv; i < v; i ++){
1477  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,((iScrollerElement*)this) -> scale,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1478  if(terrainNum == -1)
1479  put_buf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1480  else
1481  put_tbuf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1482  offs += sp + bsx;
1483  }
1484  for(i = v; i < maxv; i ++){
1485  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,-sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1486  if(terrainNum == -1)
1487  put_buf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1488  else
1489  put_tbuf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1490  offs += sp + bsx;
1491  }
1492  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1493  }
1494  if(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> dir == I_UP){
1495  offs = sp + bsx;
1496  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1497  for(i = maxv - 1; i >= v; i --){
1498  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,-sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1499  if(terrainNum == -1)
1500  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1501  else
1502  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1503  offs += sp + bsy;
1504  }
1505  for(i = v - 1; i >= pv; i --){
1506  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,((iScrollerElement*)this) -> scale,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1507  if(terrainNum == -1)
1508  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1509  else
1510  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1511  offs += sp + bsy;
1512  }
1513  for(i = pv - 1; i >= 0; i --){
1514  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1515  if(terrainNum == -1)
1516  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1517  else
1518  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1519  offs += sp + bsy;
1520  }
1521  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1522  }
1523  if(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> dir == I_LEFT){
1524  offs = sp + bsx;
1525  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1526  for(i = maxv - 1; i >= v; i --){
1527  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,-sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1528  if(terrainNum == -1)
1529  put_buf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1530  else
1531  put_tbuf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1532  offs += sp + bsx;
1533  }
1534  for(i = v - 1; i >= pv; i --){
1535  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,((iScrollerElement*)this) -> scale,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1536  if(terrainNum == -1)
1537  put_buf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1538  else
1539  put_tbuf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1540  offs += sp + bsx;
1541  }
1542  for(i = pv - 1; i >= 0; i --){
1543  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1544  if(terrainNum == -1)
1545  put_buf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1546  else
1547  put_tbuf(x + lX + offs,y + lY,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1548  offs += sp + bsx;
1549  }
1550  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1551  }
1552  if(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> dir == I_DOWN){
1553  offs = sp + bsx;
1554  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1555  for(i = 0; i < pv; i ++){
1556  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1557  if(terrainNum == -1)
1558  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1559  else
1560  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1561  offs += sp + bsy;
1562  }
1563  for(i = pv; i < v; i ++){
1564  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,((iScrollerElement*)this) -> scale,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1565  if(terrainNum == -1)
1566  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1567  else
1568  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1569  offs += sp + bsy;
1570  }
1571  for(i = v; i < maxv; i ++){
1572  scale_buf(bsx,bsy,-sc,(unsigned char*)(((iScrollerElement*)this) -> fdata),p);
1573  if(terrainNum == -1)
1574  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1575  else
1576  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY + offs,bsx,bsy,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1577  offs += sp + bsy;
1578  }
1579  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,bsx * bsy);
1580  }
1581  break;
1582  case I_TERRAIN_ELEM:
1583  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p1,bsx * bsy);
1584 
1585  if(sc){
1586  sc = ((iTerrainElement*)this) -> scale_strength;
1587 
1588  if(sc > 0)
1589  dscale_buf(bsx,bsy,256 - sc,data,p1,lX,0,((iTerrainElement*)this) -> def_null_level);
1590  else
1591  dscale_buf(bsx,bsy,256 + sc,data,p1,lX,0,((iTerrainElement*)this) -> def_null_level);
1592  }
1593  else {
1594  memcpy(p1,data,bsx * bsy);
1595  }
1596 
1597  put_fon(x,y,bsx,bsy,p1);
1598  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p1,bsx * bsy);
1599  break;
1600  case I_AVI_ELEM://Draw video
1601  if(((iAVIElement*)this) -> check_visible()){
1602  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1603  memset(p,0,SizeX * SizeY);
1604 
1605  lev = (null_lev * abs(sc)) >> 8;
1606  AVIdraw(((iAVIElement*)this) -> data);
1607  AVIGetData(((iAVIElement*)this) -> data,p);
1608 
1609  if(lev != null_lev){
1610  i_pal_quant(((iAVIElement*)this) -> palBuf,lev,null_lev);
1611  flags |= EL_PAL_CHANGE;
1612  }
1613  else {
1614  if(flags & EL_PAL_CHANGE){
1615  i_pal_quant(((iAVIElement*)this) -> palBuf,lev,null_lev);
1616  flags ^= EL_PAL_CHANGE;
1617  }
1618  }
1619 
1620  if(lev){
1621  put_frame2scr(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p);
1622  if(((iAVIElement*)this) -> ibs)
1623  ((iAVIElement*)this) -> ibs -> show();
1624  }
1625  else {
1626  memset(p,0,SizeX * SizeY);
1627  put_buf2col(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,iAVI_NULL_LEV,1);
1628  put_map(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY);
1629  if(((iAVIElement*)this) -> ibs)
1630  ((iAVIElement*)this) -> ibs -> show();
1631  }
1632 
1633  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1634  }
1635  else {
1636  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1637  memset(p,0,SizeX * SizeY);
1638  put_buf2col(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,iAVI_NULL_LEV,1);
1639  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1640  }
1641  break;
1642  case I_AVI_BORDER_ELEM:
1643  if(((iAVIBorderElement*)this) -> border_type == AVI_FLAT_BORDER){
1644  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1645  memset(p,col,SizeX * SizeY);
1646  offs = (bs + 1) + (bs + 1) * SizeX;
1647  dx1 = SizeX - (bs * 2) - 1;
1648  dy1 = SizeY - (bs * 2) - 1;
1649  for(i = 0; i < dy1; i ++){
1650  memset(p + offs,0,dx1);
1651  offs += SizeX;
1652  }
1653  add_buf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,lev);
1654  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1655  }
1656  break;
1657  }
1658  }
1659  else {
1660  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1661  _iALLOC_A_(unsigned char,p1,SizeX * SizeY);
1662  switch(type){
1663  case I_STRING_ELEM:
1664  memset(p,HFONT_NULL_LEVEL,SizeX * SizeY);
1665  iPutStr2buf(0,0,((iStringElement*)this) -> font,SizeX,SizeY,data,p,0,sc,((iStringElement*)this) -> space);
1666  scale_buf(SizeX,SizeY,sc,p,p1);
1667  smooth_buf(SizeX,SizeY,p1,sm);
1668  if(terrainNum == -1)
1669  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p1,p1,null_lev,hide_mode);
1670  else
1671  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p1,p1,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1672  break;
1673  case I_BITMAP_ELEM:
1674  scale_buf(SizeX,SizeY,sc,data,p);
1675  smooth_buf(SizeX,SizeY,p,sm);
1676  if(terrainNum == -1)
1677  put_buf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode);
1678  else
1679  put_tbuf(x + lX,y + lY,SizeX,SizeY,p,data,null_lev,hide_mode,terrainNum);
1680  break;
1681  }
1682  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p1,SizeX * SizeY);
1683  _iFREE_A_(unsigned char,p,SizeX * SizeY);
1684  }
1685 }

1687 int iScreenObject::CheckXY(int x,int y)
1688 {
1689  x -= PosX;
1690  y -= PosY;
1691 
1692  if(x >= 0 && y >= 0 && x <= SizeX && y <= SizeY)
1693  return 1;
1694  return 0;
1695 }
1696 
1697 void iScreenObject::init(void)
1698 {
1699  iTriggerObject* trg;
1700  int i,sx = 0,sy = 0,dx = 0,dy = 0;
1701  iScreenElement* p = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
1702  while(p){
1703  if(p -> terrainNum != -1) flags |= OBJ_STORE_TERRAIN;
1704  if(p -> type == I_BITMAP_ELEM && p -> flags & EL_PICTURE){
1705  flags |= OBJ_PIC_PRESENT;
1706  ((iBitmapElement*)p) -> bSizeX = p -> SizeX;
1707  ((iBitmapElement*)p) -> bSizeY = p -> SizeY;
1708  }
1709 
1710  if(!p -> SizeX){
1711  if(p -> type == I_BITMAP_ELEM || p -> type == I_SCROLLER_ELEM){
1712  ((iBitmapElement*)p) -> init_size();
1713  }
1714  if(p -> type == I_STRING_ELEM)
1715  p -> SizeX = iStrLen((unsigned char*)((iStringElement*)p) -> string,((iStringElement*)p) -> font,((iStringElement*)p) -> space);
1716  else {
1717  if(p -> type == I_SCROLLER_ELEM){
1718  switch(((iScrollerElement*)p) -> dir){
1719  case I_LEFT:
1720  case I_RIGHT:
1721  p -> SizeX = (((iScrollerElement*)p) -> space + ((iScrollerElement*)p) -> bSizeX) * (((iScrollerElement*)p) -> maxValue + 2);
1722  break;
1723  case I_UP:
1724  case I_DOWN:
1725  p -> SizeX = ((iScrollerElement*)p) -> bSizeX;
1726  break;
1727  }
1728  }
1729  else {
1730  if(p -> type == I_S_STRING_ELEM){
1731  p -> SizeX = aStrLen32(((iS_StringElement*)p) -> string,((iS_StringElement*)p) -> font,((iS_StringElement*)p) -> space);
1732 // p -> SizeX = iS_StrLen((unsigned char*)((iS_StringElement*)p) -> string,((iS_StringElement*)p) -> font,((iS_StringElement*)p) -> space);
1733  }
1734  }
1735  }
1736  }
1737  if(!p -> SizeY){
1738  if(p -> type == I_STRING_ELEM)
1739  p -> SizeY = HFntTable[((iStringElement*)p) -> font] -> SizeY;
1740  else {
1741  if(p -> type == I_SCROLLER_ELEM){
1742  switch(((iScrollerElement*)p) -> dir){
1743  case I_LEFT:
1744  case I_RIGHT:
1745  p -> SizeY = ((iScrollerElement*)p) -> bSizeY;
1746  break;
1747  case I_UP:
1748  case I_DOWN:
1749  p -> SizeY = (((iScrollerElement*)p) -> space + ((iScrollerElement*)p) -> bSizeY) * (((iScrollerElement*)p) -> maxValue + 2);
1750  break;
1751  }
1752  }
1753  else {
1754  if(p -> type == I_S_STRING_ELEM)
1755  p -> SizeY = aStrHeight32(((iStringElement*)p) -> font);
1756 // p -> SizeY = iScrFontTable[((iS_StringElement*)p) -> font] -> SizeY;
1757  }
1758  }
1759  }
1760  if(p -> type == I_AVI_ELEM){
1761  iResBuf -> init();
1762  *iResBuf < iVideoPathDefault < ((iAVIElement*)p) -> avi_name;
1763  if(!AVIopen(iResBuf->address(),AVI_NOTIMER | AVI_NODRAW | AVI_LOOPING | AVI_NOPALETTE,0,&(((iAVIElement*)p) -> data))){
1764  iResBuf -> init();
1765  *iResBuf < iVideoPath < ((iAVIElement*)p) -> avi_name;
1766  if(!AVIopen(iResBuf -> address(),AVI_NOTIMER | AVI_NODRAW | AVI_LOOPING | AVI_NOPALETTE,0,&(((iAVIElement*)p) -> data))){
1767  iResBuf -> init();
1768  *iResBuf < iVideoPath < iEMPTY_AVI;
1769  if(!AVIopen(iResBuf->address(),AVI_NOTIMER | AVI_NODRAW | AVI_LOOPING | AVI_NOPALETTE,0,&(((iAVIElement*)p) -> data)))
1770  ErrH.Abort(AVInotFound);
1771  }
1772  }
1773  if(!p -> SizeX) p -> SizeX = AVIwidth(((iAVIElement*)p) -> data);
1774  if(!p -> SizeY) p -> SizeY = AVIheight(((iAVIElement*)p) -> data);
1775  AVIclose(((iAVIElement*)p) -> data);
1776 
1777  flags |= OBJ_AVI_PRESENT;
1778  }
1779  if(p -> lX + p -> SizeX > sx) sx = p -> lX + p -> SizeX;
1780  if(p -> lY + p -> SizeY > sy) sy = p -> lY + p -> SizeY;
1781  if(p -> flags & EL_TEXT_STRING){
1782  p -> align_x = align_x;
1783  }
1784  p = (iScreenElement*)p -> prev;
1785  }
1786  if(!SizeX){
1787  SizeX = sx;
1788  flags |= OBJ_AUTO_SIZE;
1789  }
1790  if(!SizeY){
1791  SizeY = sy;
1792  flags |= OBJ_AUTO_SIZE;
1793  }
1794 
1795  if(!(flags & OBJ_ALIGN)){
1796  switch(align_x){
1797  case ALIGN_CENTER:
1798  PosX = (I_RES_X - SizeX)/2 + align_x_offs;
1799  break;
1800  case ALIGN_L:
1801  PosX = align_x_offs;
1802  break;
1803  case ALIGN_R:
1804  PosX = I_RES_X - SizeX - align_x_offs - 1;
1805  break;
1806  }
1807  switch(align_y){
1808  case ALIGN_CENTER:
1809  PosY = (I_RES_Y - SizeY)/2 + align_y_offs;
1810  break;
1811  case ALIGN_U:
1812  PosY = align_y_offs;
1813  break;
1814  case ALIGN_D:
1815  PosY = I_RES_Y - SizeY - align_y_offs - 1;
1816  break;
1817  }
1818  flags |= OBJ_ALIGN;
1819  }
1820 
1821  p = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
1822  while(p){
1823  switch(p -> align_x){
1824  case ALIGN_CENTER:
1825  p -> lX = (SizeX - p -> SizeX)/2 + p -> align_x_offs;
1826  break;
1827  case ALIGN_L:
1828  p -> lX = p -> align_x_offs;
1829  break;
1830  case ALIGN_R:
1831  p -> lX = SizeX - p -> SizeX - p -> align_x_offs - 1;
1832  break;
1833  }
1834  switch(p -> align_y){
1835  case ALIGN_CENTER:
1836  p -> lY = (SizeY - p -> SizeY)/2 + p -> align_y_offs;
1837  break;
1838  case ALIGN_U:
1839  p -> lY = p -> align_y_offs;
1840  break;
1841  case ALIGN_D:
1842  p -> lY = SizeY - p -> SizeY - p -> align_y_offs - 1;
1843  break;
1844  }
1845  p -> nlX = p -> lX;
1846  p -> nlY = p -> lY;
1847  if(p -> type == I_TERRAIN_ELEM){
1848  ((iTerrainElement*)p) -> pX = PosX + p -> lX;
1849  ((iTerrainElement*)p) -> pY = PosY + p -> lY;
1850  flags |= OBJ_TERRAIN;
1851  }
1852 
1853  p = (iScreenElement*)p -> prev;
1854  }
1855  if(flags & OBJ_AUTO_SIZE && !(flags & OBJ_SET_COORDS) && !(flags & OBJ_AVI_PRESENT) && !(flags & OBJ_PIC_PRESENT)){
1856  dx = (PosX > ShadowSize) ? ShadowSize : PosX;
1857  dy = (PosY + SizeY < I_RES_Y - ShadowSize - 1) ? ShadowSize : (I_RES_Y - (PosY + SizeY) - 1);
1858 
1859  nPosX = PosX;
1860  nPosY = PosY;
1861 
1862  PosX -= dx;
1863  SizeX += dx;
1864 
1865  p = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
1866  while(p){
1867  p -> lX += dx;
1868  p = (iScreenElement*)p -> prev;
1869  }
1870 
1871  if(PosX + SizeX < I_RES_X - 1)
1872  SizeX ++;
1873  if(PosY + SizeY < I_RES_Y - 1)
1874  SizeY ++;
1875  }
1876 
1877  if(flags & OBJ_TRIGGER){
1878  trg = (iTriggerObject*)this;
1879  for(i = 0; i < trg -> num_state; i ++)
1880  ((iScreenElement*)trg -> StateElem[i]) -> flags |= EL_NO_REDRAW;
1881 
1882  ((iScreenElement*)trg -> StateElem[trg -> state]) -> flags ^= EL_NO_REDRAW;
1883  }
1884 
1885  if(owner && !(flags & OBJ_SET_COORDS)){
1886  PosX += ((iScreen*)owner) -> ScreenOffs;
1887  }
1888  flags |= OBJ_SET_COORDS;
1889 
1890  if(PosX < 0 || PosX >= I_MAP_RES_X - SizeX){
1891  ErrH.Abort("Object PosX out of map...",XERR_USER,PosX,ID_ptr.c_str());
1892  }
1893  if(PosY < 0 || PosY >= I_RES_Y - SizeY){
1894  ErrH.Abort("Object PosY out of map...",XERR_USER,PosY,ID_ptr.c_str());
1895  }
1896 }
1897 
1898 void iScreenObject::redraw(int mode)
1899 {
1900  int hide_mode = flags & OBJ_HIDE;
1901  iScreenElement* p = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
1902 
1903  if(flags & OBJ_PIC_PRESENT && flags & OBJ_CLEAR_FON){
1904  if(FlushX == -1){
1905  iregRender(PosX,PosY,PosX + SizeX,PosY + SizeY);
1906  }
1907  else {
1908  iregRender(FlushX,FlushY,FlushX + FlushSX,FlushY + FlushSY);
1909  }
1910  flags ^= OBJ_CLEAR_FON;
1911  }
1912 
1913  if(flags & OBJ_REINIT){
1914  FlushX = PosX;
1915  FlushY = PosY;
1916  FlushSX = SizeX;
1917  FlushSY = SizeY;
1918 
1919  if(flags & OBJ_AUTO_SIZE){
1920  SizeX = SizeY = 0;
1921  PosX = nPosX;
1922  PosY = nPosY;
1923 
1924  while(p){
1925  p -> lX = p -> nlX;
1926  p -> lY = p -> nlY;
1927 
1928  p -> SizeX = p -> SizeY = 0;
1929 
1930  p = (iScreenElement*)p -> prev;
1931  }
1932 
1933  flags &= ~OBJ_ALIGN;
1934  flags &= ~OBJ_SET_COORDS;
1935  }
1936  init();
1937  flags &= ~OBJ_REINIT;
1938 
1939  if(FlushX > PosX) FlushX = PosX;
1940  if(FlushX + FlushSX < PosX + SizeX) FlushSX = PosX + SizeX - FlushX;
1941  if(FlushY > PosY) FlushY = PosY;
1942  if(FlushY + FlushSY < PosY + SizeY) FlushSY = PosY + SizeY - FlushY;
1943  getfon();
1944  }
1945 
1946  p = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
1947  while(p){
1948  if(!(p -> flags & EL_NO_REDRAW) && p -> type != I_S_STRING_ELEM && p -> type != I_AVI_ELEM && !(p -> flags & EL_PICTURE))
1949  p -> redraw(PosX,PosY,curHeightScale,SmoothLevel,hide_mode);
1950  p = (iScreenElement*)p -> prev;
1951  }
1952  if(!(flags & OBJ_AVI_PRESENT) && !(flags & OBJ_AVI_BORDER) && !(flags & OBJ_PIC_PRESENT)){
1953  if(FlushX == -1){
1954  iregRender(PosX,PosY,PosX + SizeX,PosY + SizeY);
1955  }
1956  else {
1957  iregRender(FlushX,FlushY,FlushX + FlushSX,FlushY + FlushSY);
1958  }
1959  }
1960 
1961  p = (iScreenElement*)ElementList -> last;
1962  while(p){
1963  if(!(p -> flags & EL_NO_REDRAW) && (p -> flags & EL_PICTURE || p -> type == I_S_STRING_ELEM || p -> type == I_AVI_ELEM))
1964  p -> redraw(PosX,PosY,curHeightScale,SmoothLevel,hide_mode);
1965  p = (iScreenElement*)p -> prev;
1966  }
1967 #ifdef _DEBUG
1968  if(iBoundsLog)
1969  map_rectangle(PosX + 1,PosY + 1,SizeX - 2,SizeY - 2,111);
1970 #endif
1971  if(!(flags & OBJ_AVI_PRESENT) || flags & OBJ_AVI_STOPPED){
1972  if(FlushX == -1){
1973  put_map(PosX,PosY,SizeX,SizeY);
1974  }
1975  else {
1976  put_map(FlushX,FlushY,FlushSX,FlushSY);
1977  }
1978  }
1979  if(mode)
1980  flush();
1981 }
1982 
1983 void iScreenObject::flush(void)
1984 {
1985  int x0,x1,sx;
1986  if(FlushX == -1 ){
1987  x0 = PosX - iScreenOffs;
1988  x1 = x0 + SizeX;
1989 
1990  if(x0 < 0) x0 = 0;
1991  if(x1 >= I_RES_X) x1 = I_RES_X - 1;
1992 
1993  sx = x1 - x0;
1994 
1995  if(sx > 0)
1996  XGR_Flush(x0,PosY,sx,SizeY);
1997  }
1998  else {
1999  x0 = FlushX - iScreenOffs;
2000  x1 = x0 + FlushSX;
2001 
2002  if(x0 < 0) x0 = 0;
2003  if(x1 >= I_RES_X) x1 = I_RES_X - 1;
2004 
2005  sx = x1 - x0;
2006 
2007  XGR_Flush(x0,FlushY,sx,FlushSY);
2008  FlushX = FlushY = -1;
2009  }
2010 }

2409 void iScreenDispatcher::ProcessEvent(iScreenEvent* p)
2410 {
2411  int i,sc;
2412  iScreenObject* obj;
2413  iScrollerElement* scl;
2414  iTriggerObject* trg;
2415  iScreenEventCommand* cm;
2416  iScreenElement* el;
2417  iAVIElement* avi_el;
2418  iList* list;
2419  iListElement* list_el;
2420 
2421  cm = (iScreenEventCommand*)p -> CommSeq -> last;
2422  while(cm){
2423  if(!(p -> flags & EV_MULTI_LINE) || !cm -> LineID || cm -> LineID == iEvLineID){
2424  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1){
2425  EventFlag = cm -> EvType;
2426  CurEvComm = cm;
2427  }
2428  if(cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time){
2429  EventFlag = cm -> EvType;
2430  CurEvComm = cm;
2431  i_preExtQuant();
2432  EventFlag = 0;
2433  }
2434 
2435  if(cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time){
2436  switch(cm -> EvType){
2437  case EV_LOCK_OBJ:
2438  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2439  obj -> flags |= OBJ_LOCKED;
2440  break;
2441  case EV_UNLOCK_OBJ:
2442  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2443  obj -> flags &= ~OBJ_LOCKED;
2444  break;
2445  case EV_EXT_EVENT:
2446  iHandleExtEvent(cm -> value,cm -> data0);
2447  break;
2448  case EV_RESET_TEXTS:
2449  curText = NULL;
2450  iEvLineID = iTEXT_NORMAL;
2451  break;
2452  case EV_NEXT_TEXT:
2453  if(copy_text_next((iScreen*)cm -> obj,cm -> value)) return;
2454  break;
2455  case EV_PREV_TEXT:
2456  if(copy_text_prev((iScreen*)cm -> obj,cm -> value)) return;
2457  break;
2458  case EV_STOP_AVI:
2459  avi_el = (iAVIElement*)cm -> obj;
2460  obj = (iScreenObject*)avi_el -> owner;
2461  avi_el -> flags |= AVI_STOPPED;
2462  obj -> flags |= OBJ_AVI_STOPPED;
2463  break;
2464  case EV_PLAY_AVI:
2465  avi_el = (iAVIElement*)cm -> obj;
2466  obj = (iScreenObject*)avi_el -> owner;
2467  avi_el -> flags &= ~AVI_STOPPED;
2468  obj -> flags &= ~OBJ_AVI_STOPPED;
2469  break;
2470  case EV_RISE_OBJECT:
2471  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2472  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2473  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = (256 - obj -> curHeightScale) / cm -> time;
2474  break;
2475  case EV_HIDE_OBJECT:
2476  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2477  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2478  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = -obj -> curHeightScale / cm -> time;
2479  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2480  break;
2481  case EV_LOW_OBJECT:
2482  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2483  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2484  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = (I_UNSELECT_SCALE - obj -> curHeightScale) / cm -> time;
2485  break;
2486  case EV_START_DEMO:
2487 // startRecorder();
2488  break;
2489  case EV_SCALE_OBJECT:
2490  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2491  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2492  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = (cm -> value - obj -> curHeightScale) / cm -> time;
2493  break;
2494  case EV_SMOOTH_OBJECT:
2495  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2496  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2497 
2498  if(cm -> value == obj -> SmoothLevel){
2499  obj -> SmoothTime = 0;
2500  obj -> SmoothDelta = 0;
2501  }
2502  else {
2503  obj -> SmoothTime = cm -> time / (cm -> value - obj -> SmoothLevel);
2504  if(obj -> SmoothTime < 0){
2505  obj -> SmoothDelta = -1;
2506  obj -> SmoothTime = -obj -> SmoothTime;
2507  }
2508  else {
2509  obj -> SmoothDelta = 1;
2510  }
2511  }
2512 
2513  obj -> SmoothCount = obj -> SmoothTime >> 1;
2514  break;
2515  case EV_OBJECT_JUMP:
2516  curScr -> curObj -> flags ^= OBJ_SELECTED;
2517  curScr -> curObj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2518  curScr -> curObj -> flags |= OBJ_SELECTED;
2519  break;
2520  case EV_SCREEN_JUMP:
2521  curScr -> free_data();
2522  curScr = (iScreen*)cm -> obj;
2523  curScr -> prepare();
2524  curScr -> load_data();
2525  break;
2526  case EV_EXT_SCREEN_JUMP:
2527  curScr -> free_data();
2528  curScr = iScrDisp -> get_ext_screen(cm -> pvalue);
2529  if(!curScr)
2530  ErrH.Abort("Can't find screen...",XERR_USER,0,cm -> pvalue);
2531 
2532  curScr -> prepare();
2533  curScr -> load_data();
2534  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> TerrainList -> last;
2535  while(obj){
2536  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2537  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2538  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2539  }
2540  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> objList -> last;
2541  while(obj){
2542  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2543  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2544  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2545  }
2546  break;
2547  case EV_RISE_SCREEN:
2548  flags |= SD_GETFON;
2549  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> TerrainList -> last;
2550  while(obj){
2551  if(obj -> flags & OBJ_SELECTED || !(obj -> flags & OBJ_SELECTABLE))
2552  sc = ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> scale_strength;
2553  else
2554  sc = I_UNSELECT_SCALE;
2555 
2556  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2557  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2558  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = (sc - obj -> curHeightScale) / cm -> time;
2559 
2560  sc = ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> def_null_level;
2561  ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> level_delta = (sc - ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> null_level) / cm -> time;
2562 
2563  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2564  }
2565  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> objList -> last;
2566  while(obj){
2567  if(obj -> flags & OBJ_SELECTED || !(obj -> flags & OBJ_SELECTABLE))
2568  sc = 256;
2569  else
2570  sc = I_UNSELECT_SCALE;
2571 
2572  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2573  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2574  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = (sc - obj -> curHeightScale) / cm -> time;
2575  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2576  }
2577  break;
2578  case EV_HIDE_SCREEN:
2579  flags |= SD_GETFON;
2580  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> objList -> last;
2581  while(obj){
2582  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = -obj -> curHeightScale / cm -> time;
2583  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2584  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2585  }
2586  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> TerrainList -> last;
2587  while(obj){
2588  obj -> HeightScaleDelta = -obj -> curHeightScale / cm -> time;
2589  obj -> flags |= OBJ_HIDE;
2590 
2591  ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> level_delta = -((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> null_level / cm -> time;
2592 
2593  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2594  }
2595  break;
2596  case EV_CHANGE_SCROLLER:
2597  scl = (iScrollerElement*)cm -> obj;
2598  if(scl -> check_xy(iMouseX + iScreenOffs,iMouseY)){
2599  scl -> change_val(iMouseX + iScreenOffs,iMouseY);
2600  scl -> scale_delta = (scl -> Value > scl -> prevValue) ? 512 / cm -> time : -512 / cm -> time;
2601  }
2602  else {
2603  scl -> prevValue = scl -> Value;
2604  scl -> scale_delta = 0;
2605  }
2606  break;
2607  case EV_CHANGE_TRIGGER:
2608  trg = (iTriggerObject*)cm -> obj;
2609  trg -> change_state(cm -> time);
2610  break;
2611  case EV_PREV_TRIGGER:
2612  trg = (iTriggerObject*)cm -> obj;
2613  trg -> change_state(cm -> time,-2);
2614  break;
2615  case EV_SET_TRIGGER:
2616  trg = (iTriggerObject*)cm -> obj;
2617  if(trg -> state != cm -> value)
2618  trg -> change_state(cm -> time,cm -> value);
2619  else
2620  trg -> prev_state = trg -> state;
2621  break;
2622  case EV_CHANGE_AVI:
2623  avi_el = (iAVIElement*)cm -> obj;
2624  avi_el -> change_avi(cm -> pvalue);
2625  avi_el -> init_size();
2626  avi_el -> init_align();
2627  break;
2628  case EV_NEXT_AVI:
2629  avi_el = (iAVIElement*)cm -> obj;
2630  avi_el -> next_avi();
2631  avi_el -> init_size();
2632  avi_el -> init_align();
2633  break;
2634  case EV_PREV_AVI:
2635  avi_el = (iAVIElement*)cm -> obj;
2636  avi_el -> prev_avi();
2637  avi_el -> init_size();
2638  avi_el -> init_align();
2639  break;
2640  case EV_LIST_CHANGE_AVI:
2641  avi_el = (iAVIElement*)cm -> obj;
2642  list = (iList*)cm -> pvalue;
2643  list_el = list -> first;
2644  list -> index ++;
2645  if(list -> index >= list -> Size)
2646  list -> index = 0;
2647  for(i = 0; i < list -> index; i ++)
2648  list_el = list_el -> next;
2649 
2650  avi_el -> change_avi((char *)list_el->ID_ptr.c_str());
2651  avi_el -> init_size();
2652  avi_el -> init_align();
2653  break;
2654  case EV_INPUT_STRING:
2655  if(!(flags & SD_INPUT_STRING) && !(flags & SD_FINISH_INPUT)){
2656  el = (iScreenElement*)cm -> obj;
2657  init_input_string(el);
2658  cur_max_input = cm -> value;
2659  }
2660  break;
2661  case EV_MOVE_SCREEN:
2662  aci_move_screen(cm -> value,cm -> time);
2663  p -> cur_time = cm -> time + cm -> start_time - 1;
2664  break;
2665  case EV_MOVE2SCREEN:
2666  move2screen((iScreen*)cm -> obj,cm -> time);
2667  p -> cur_time = cm -> time + cm -> start_time - 1;
2668  break;
2669  case EV_SEND2ACTINT:
2670  aci_SendEvent(cm -> value + ACI_MAX_EVENT);
2671  break;
2672  case EV_SEND2ML_DISP:
2673  aciML_SendEvent(cm -> value);
2674  break;
2675  case EV_ML_EVENT:
2676  aciML_SendEvent(cm -> value,cm -> data0,cm -> data1);
2677  break;
2678  case EV_SEND_DATA2ACTINT:
2679  aci_SendEvent((cm -> value & 0xFFFF) + ACI_MAX_EVENT,(cm -> value >> 16) & 0xFFFF);
2680  break;
2681  case EV_SET_LINE_ID:
2682  iEvLineID = cm -> value;
2683  break;
2684  case EV_END_EVENT:
2685  p -> cur_time = p -> time;
2686  break;
2687  case EV_EXIT_EVENT:
2688  p -> cur_time = p -> time;
2689  aciChangeLineID();
2690  break;
2691  case EV_CHECK_CREDITS:
2692  if(!aciCheckCredits())
2693  p -> cur_time = p -> time;
2694  break;
2695  }
2696  }
2697  if(cm -> start_time <= p -> cur_time && cm -> time + cm -> start_time > p -> cur_time){
2698  switch(cm -> EvType){
2699  case EV_RISE_OBJECT:
2700  case EV_LOW_OBJECT:
2701  case EV_SCALE_OBJECT:
2702  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2703  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2704  obj -> ScaleQuant();
2705 
2706  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1)
2707  obj -> flags &= ~OBJ_HIDE;
2708 
2709  set_obj_redraw(obj);
2710  break;
2711  case EV_SMOOTH_OBJECT:
2712  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2713  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2714  obj -> SmoothQuant();
2715 
2716  set_obj_redraw(obj);
2717  break;
2718  case EV_HIDE_OBJECT:
2719  obj = (iScreenObject*)cm -> obj;
2720  if(!obj) obj = curScr -> curObj;
2721 
2722  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1)
2723  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2724  else
2725  obj -> ScaleQuant();
2726 
2727  set_obj_redraw(obj);
2728  break;
2729  case EV_HIDE_SCREEN:
2730  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1)
2731  flags |= SD_END_GETFON;
2732  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> objList -> last;
2733  while(obj){
2734  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1)
2735  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2736  else
2737  obj -> ScaleQuant();
2738 
2739  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2740  }
2741  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> TerrainList -> last;
2742  while(obj){
2743  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1){
2744  ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> null_level = 0;
2745  obj -> curHeightScale = 0;
2746  }
2747  else
2748  obj -> ScaleQuant();
2749 
2750  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2751  }
2752  set_scr_redraw(curScr);
2753  break;
2754  case EV_RISE_SCREEN:
2755  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1)
2756  flags |= SD_END_GETFON;
2757  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> objList -> last;
2758  while(obj){
2759  obj -> ScaleQuant();
2760  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1){
2761  obj -> flags &= ~OBJ_HIDE;
2762  }
2763  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2764  }
2765  obj = (iScreenObject*)curScr -> TerrainList -> last;
2766  while(obj){
2767  obj -> ScaleQuant();
2768  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1){
2769  ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> null_level = ((iTerrainElement*)obj -> ElementList -> last) -> def_null_level;
2770  obj -> flags &= ~OBJ_HIDE;
2771  }
2772  obj = (iScreenObject*)obj -> prev;
2773  }
2774  set_scr_redraw(curScr);
2775  break;
2776  case EV_EXIT:
2777  if(!actIntLog || (aScrDisp -> curMatrix || !cm -> value)){
2778  iScrDisp -> flags |= SD_EXIT;
2779  iScrDisp -> ret_val = cm -> value;
2780  }
2781  break;
2782  case EV_CHANGE_SCROLLER:
2783  scl = (iScrollerElement*)cm -> obj;
2784  obj = (iScreenObject*)scl -> owner;
2785  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1){
2786  scl -> prevValue = scl -> Value;
2787  }
2788  else
2789  scl -> change_quant();
2790 
2791  set_obj_redraw(obj);
2792  break;
2793  case EV_CHANGE_TRIGGER:
2794  case EV_SET_TRIGGER:
2795  case EV_PREV_TRIGGER:
2796  trg = (iTriggerObject*)cm -> obj;
2797  if(trg -> state != trg -> prev_state){
2798  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1){
2799  el = (iScreenElement*)trg -> StateElem[trg -> prev_state];
2800  el -> scale = 0;
2801  el -> flags |= EL_NO_REDRAW;
2802  if(el -> type == I_AVI_ELEM) trg -> flags |= OBJ_AVI_STOPPED;
2803 
2804  el = (iScreenElement*)trg -> StateElem[trg -> state];
2805  el -> scale = 256;
2806  el -> flags &= ~EL_HIDE;
2807  if(el -> type == I_AVI_ELEM) trg -> flags &= ~OBJ_AVI_STOPPED;
2808  }
2809  else {
2810  el = (iScreenElement*)trg -> StateElem[trg -> prev_state];
2811  el -> scale_quant();
2812 
2813  el = (iScreenElement*)trg -> StateElem[trg -> state];
2814  el -> scale_quant();
2815  if(el -> type == I_AVI_ELEM) trg -> flags &= ~OBJ_AVI_STOPPED;
2816  }
2817  set_obj_redraw((iScreenObject*)trg);
2818  }
2819  break;
2820  case EV_INPUT_STRING:
2821  if(cm -> time + cm -> start_time == p -> cur_time + 1)
2822  flags &= ~(SD_INPUT_STRING | SD_FINISH_INPUT);
2823  break;
2824  }
2825  }
2826  }
2827  cm = (iScreenEventCommand*)cm -> prev;
2828  }
2829  p -> cur_time ++;
2830  if(p -> cur_time >= p -> time){
2831  p -> flags &= ~EV_ACTIVE;
2832  ActiveEv = NULL;
2833  }
2834 }

2872 iScreenFont::iScreenFont(char* p,int sz)
2873 {
2874  data = p;
2875  SizeX = 8;
2876  SizeY = sz / 256;
2877 
2878  int i,j,s,offs = 0;
2879  int align_left,align_right,fl,fr;
2880 
2881  LeftOffs = new char[256];
2882  RightOffs = new char[256];
2883  for(s = 0; s < 256; s ++){
2884  offs = SizeY * s;
2885  align_left = align_right = 3;
2886  for(i = 0; i < SizeY; i ++){
2887  fl = fr = 0;
2888  for(j = 0; j < SizeX; j ++){
2889  if(!fr && p[offs] & (1 << j) && j < align_right){
2890  align_right = j;
2891  fr = 1;
2892  }
2893  if(!fl && p[offs] & (1 << (7 - j)) && j < align_left){
2894  align_left = j;
2895  fl = 1;
2896  }
2897  }
2898  offs ++;
2899  }
2900  if(s != ' '){
2901  LeftOffs[s] = align_left;
2902  RightOffs[s] = align_right;
2903  }
2904  else {
2905  LeftOffs[s] = 0;
2906  RightOffs[s] = 0;
2907  }
2908  }
2909 }

2911 void iScreenElement::init_align(void)
2912 {
2913  iScreenObject* own = (iScreenObject*)owner;
2914  switch(align_x){
2915  case ALIGN_CENTER:
2916  lX = (own -> SizeX - SizeX)/2 + align_x_offs;
2917  break;
2918  case ALIGN_L:
2919  lX = align_x_offs;
2920  break;
2921  case ALIGN_R:
2922  lX = own -> SizeX - SizeX - align_x_offs - 1;
2923  break;
2924  }
2925  switch(align_y){
2926  case ALIGN_CENTER:
2927  lY = (own -> SizeY - SizeY)/2 + align_y_offs;
2928  break;
2929  case ALIGN_U:
2930  lY = align_y_offs;
2931  break;
2932  case ALIGN_D:
2933  lY = own -> SizeY - SizeY - align_y_offs - 1;
2934  break;
2935  }
2936 }

3096 void iScreen::init_avi_border(void)

3110  if(!el)

3112  avi = (iAVIElement*)el;

3412 void iScreenDispatcher::input_string_quant(void)
3413 {
3414  int k,sz,init_flag = 0,redraw_flag = 0,code,shift_flag = 0;
3415  iListElementPtr* tmp;
3416  iScreenObject* obj;
3417  unsigned char* ptr = NULL;
3418  HFont* hfnt = NULL;
3419 
3420  const char* key_name = NULL;
3421 
3422  switch(ActiveEl -> type){
3423  case I_STRING_ELEM:
3424  ptr = (unsigned char*)(((iStringElement*)ActiveEl) -> string);
3425  hfnt = HFntTable[(((iStringElement*)ActiveEl) -> font)];
3426  break;
3427  case I_S_STRING_ELEM:
3428  ptr = (unsigned char*)(((iS_StringElement*)ActiveEl) -> string);
3429  break;
3430  default:
3431  ErrH.Abort("Bad input string type...");
3432  break;
3433  }
3434 
3435  while(KeyBuf -> size) {
3436  SDL_Event *event = KeyBuf->get();
3437  //TODO: UTF8 fix
3438  if (event->type != SDL_KEYDOWN)
3439  continue;
3440  k = sdlEventToCode(event);
3441 
3442  if(!(k & 0x1000)) {
3443  if(!(ActiveEl -> flags & EL_KEY_NAME)){
3444  switch(k){
3445  case SDL_SCANCODE_RETURN:
3446  sz = strlen((char*)ptr);
3447  ptr[sz - 1] = 0;
3448  flags ^= SD_INPUT_STRING;
3449  flags |= SD_FINISH_INPUT;
3450  init_flag = 1;
3451  redraw_flag = 1;
3452  break;
3453  case SDL_SCANCODE_ESCAPE:
3454  strcpy((char*)ptr,BackupStr);
3455  flags ^= SD_INPUT_STRING;
3456  flags |= SD_FINISH_INPUT;
3457  init_flag = 1;
3458  redraw_flag = 1;
3459  break;
3460  case SDL_SCANCODE_LEFT:
3461  case SDL_SCANCODE_BACKSPACE:
3462  sz = strlen((char*)ptr);
3463  if(sz > 1){
3464  ptr[sz - 1] = 0;
3465  ptr[sz - 2] = '_';
3466  init_flag = 1;
3467  redraw_flag = 1;
3468  }
3469  break;
3470  default:
3471  if(!(ActiveEl -> flags & EL_NUMBER)){
3472  if(KeyBuf -> flag & SHIFT_PRESSED) shift_flag = 1;
3473  code = SDL_GetKeyFromScancode((SDL_Scancode)k);
3474  if(code && hfnt && code < hfnt->NumChars){
3475  if((hfnt -> data[code] -> Flags & NULL_HCHAR) && code != ' ')
3476  break;
3477  sz = strlen((char*)ptr);
3478  if(sz < cur_max_input){
3479  ptr[sz - 1] = code;
3480  ptr[sz] = '_';
3481  ptr[sz + 1] = 0;
3482 
3483  init_flag = 1;
3484  redraw_flag = 1;
3485  }
3486  }
3487  }
3488  else {
3489  if(KeyBuf -> flag & SHIFT_PRESSED) shift_flag = 1;
3490  code = SDL_GetKeyFromScancode((SDL_Scancode)k);
3491  if(code && code >= '0' && code <= '9'){
3492  if(hfnt && (hfnt -> data[code] -> Flags & NULL_HCHAR) && code != ' ')
3493  break;
3494  sz = strlen((char*)ptr);
3495  if(sz < cur_max_input){
3496  ptr[sz - 1] = code;
3497  ptr[sz] = '_';
3498  ptr[sz + 1] = 0;
3499 
3500  init_flag = 1;
3501  redraw_flag = 1;
3502  }
3503  }
3504  }
3505  break;
3506  }
3507  }
3508  else {
3509  switch(k){
3510  case SDL_SCANCODE_ESCAPE:
3511  strcpy((char*)ptr,BackupStr);
3512  flags ^= SD_INPUT_STRING;
3513  flags |= SD_FINISH_INPUT;
3514  init_flag = 1;
3515  redraw_flag = 1;
3516  iScreenLastInput = k;
3517  break;
3518  default:
3519  //NEED rewrite
3520  /*if(!(k & iJOYSTICK_MASK))
3521  key_name = iGetKeyNameText(k,lang());
3522  else
3523  key_name = iGetJoyBtnNameText(k,lang());
3524  */
3525  key_name = iGetKeyNameText(k,lang());
3526  if(flags & SD_INPUT_STRING && key_name){
3527  if(!(ActiveEl -> flags & EL_JOYSTICK_KEY) || (k & iJOYSTICK_MASK)){
3528  strcpy((char*)ptr,key_name);
3529  flags ^= SD_INPUT_STRING;
3530  flags |= SD_FINISH_INPUT;
3531  init_flag = 1;
3532  redraw_flag = 1;
3533  iScreenLastInput = k;
3534  }
3535  }
3536  break;
3537  }
3538  }
3539  }
3540  }
3541  if(init_flag){
3542  obj = (iScreenObject*)ActiveEl -> owner;
3543  obj -> flags |= OBJ_REINIT;
3544  }
3545  else {
3546  if(iFrameFlag){
3547  sz = strlen((char*)ptr);
3548  if(ptr[sz - 1] == ' ')
3549  ptr[sz - 1] = '_';
3550  else
3551  ptr[sz - 1] = ' ';
3552 
3553  ptr[sz] = 0;
3554 
3555  redraw_flag = 1;
3556  }
3557  }
3558  if(redraw_flag){
3559  obj = (iScreenObject*)ActiveEl -> owner;
3560  if(!(obj -> flags & OBJ_REDRAW)){
3561  obj -> flags |= OBJ_REDRAW;
3562 
3563  _iALLOC_(iListElementPtr,tmp);
3564  tmp -> ptr = (iListElement*)obj;
3565  drwObjHeap -> connect((iListElement*)tmp);
3566  }
3567  }
3568  iFrameFlag = 0;
3569 }

3799 void iScreenDispatcher::pal_quant(void)
3800 {
3801  int i,flag = 0;
3802  unsigned val,t_val;
3803  for(i = I_PAL_OFFS; i < 768; i ++){
3804  val = curPal[i];
3805  t_val = trgPal[i];
3806  if(val != t_val){
3807  flag = 1;
3808  val += SD_PAL_DELTA;
3809  if(val > t_val) val = t_val;
3810  curPal[i] = val;
3811  }

3975 void iTextData::load(void)
3976 {
3977  XStream fh;
3978  int i,l = 0,num_len = 0;
3979 
3980  fh.open(fname,XS_IN);
3981  mem_heap = aciLoadPackedFile(fh,heap_size);
3982 
3983 // heap_size = fh.size();
3984 // mem_heap = new char[heap_size];
3985 // fh.read(mem_heap,heap_size);
3986 
3987  fh.close();
3988 
3989  for(i = 0; i < heap_size; i ++){
3990  if(mem_heap[i] == '\n') num_len ++;
3991  }
3992 
3993  data = new char*[num_len];
3994  for(i = 0; i < num_len; i ++)
3995  data[i] = NULL;
3996 
3997  data[0] = mem_heap;
3998 
3999  numLines = num_len;
4000 
4001  for(i = 0; i < heap_size; i ++){
4002  if(mem_heap[i] == '\n'){
4003  l ++;
4004  mem_heap[i] = 0;
4005  if(l <= num_len - 1)
4006  data[l] = mem_heap + i + 1;
4007  }
4008  }
4009 
4010  for(i = 0; i < heap_size; i ++){
4011  if(mem_heap[i] == '\r') mem_heap[i] = 0;
4012  }
4013  reset();
4014 
4015  flags |= iTEXT_DATA_LOADED;
4016 }

4070  }

4153 int iScreenDispatcher::copy_text_next(iScreen* scr,int mode)

4160  next_text();
4161  }
4162  else {

4166  ActiveEv = NULL;

4170  if(lang() != RUSSIAN){
4171  if(id > iTEXT_ENG_MAX){
4172  key_trap(end_code);
4173  }
4174  else {
4175  next_text();
4176  if(title_obj){
4177  strcpy(title_obj -> string,curText -> objName);
4178  title_obj -> init_size();
4179  title_obj -> init_align();
4180  }
4181  key_trap(next_code);
4182  }
4183  }
4184  else {
4185  if(id > iTEXT_RUS_MAX){
4186  key_trap(end_code);
4187  }
4188  else {
4189  next_text();
4190  if(title_obj){
4191  strcpy(title_obj -> string,curText -> objName);
4192  title_obj -> init_size();
4193  title_obj -> init_align();
4194  }
4195  key_trap(next_code);
4196  }
4197  }
4198  return 1;
4199  }
4200  }
4201 
4202  if(!curText) return 0;
4203 
4204  if(title_obj){
4205  strcpy(title_obj -> string,curText -> objName);
4206  title_obj -> init_size();
4207  title_obj -> init_align();
4208  }
4209  curText -> copy(obj);
4210  }

4214 int iScreenDispatcher::copy_text_prev(iScreen* scr,int mode)
4215 {
4216  int id,prev_code;
4217  iScreenObject* obj = (iScreenObject*)scr -> get_object("Text00");
4218  iStringElement* title_obj = (iStringElement*)scr -> get_object("TextTitle00");
4219  if(obj){
4220  if(!curText){
4221  next_text();
4222  }
4223  else {
4224  if(curText -> curLine <= obj -> ElementList -> Size){
4225  id = curText -> ID - 1;
4226  ActiveEv -> flags &= ~EV_ACTIVE;
4227  ActiveEv = NULL;
4228 
4229  prev_code = (mode) ? iTEXT_PREV_EVENT_CODE1 : iTEXT_PREV_EVENT_CODE0;
4230  if((lang() != RUSSIAN && id > 0) || id > iTEXT_RUS1_ID - 1){
4231  prev_text();
4232  if(title_obj){
4233  strcpy(title_obj -> string,curText -> objName);
4234  title_obj -> init_size();
4235  title_obj -> init_align();
4236  }
4237  curText -> curLine = curText -> numLines - (curText -> numLines % obj -> ElementList -> Size) + obj -> ElementList -> Size * 2;
4238  key_trap(prev_code);
4239  }
4240  return 1;
4241  }
4242  else {
4243  if(curText -> curLine >= obj -> ElementList -> Size * 2){
4244  if(curText -> curLine != curText -> numLines)
4245  curText -> curLine -= obj -> ElementList -> Size * 2;
4246  else
4247  curText -> curLine -= obj -> ElementList -> Size + (curText -> numLines % obj -> ElementList -> Size);
4248  }
4249  else {
4250  ActiveEv -> flags &= ~EV_ACTIVE;
4251  ActiveEv = NULL;
4252  return 1;
4253  }
4254  }
4255  }
4256 
4257  if(!curText) return 0;
4258 
4259  if(title_obj){
4260  strcpy(title_obj -> string,curText -> objName);
4261  title_obj -> init_size();
4262  title_obj -> init_align();
4263  }
4264  curText -> flags &= ~iTEXT_EOF;
4265  curText -> copy(obj);
4266  }
4267  return 0;
4268 }
